attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Bingo is currently treated unfairly by a number of Government policies, spearheaded by an unfair tax regime.  The combined effects of these policies currently see some 200 bingo clubs under threat of closure.

Bingo clubs are a key aspect of local communities, providing a safe environment for a predominantly female audience, in addition to which they also employ over 22,000 people throughout the UK and contribute over £270 milion annually to the Treasury.

Consumer research has shown that communities value their bingo club, Government must take action and rethink its approach to regulation and taxation of the industry.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
